org.eclipse.xtend.lib.macro.declaration

Interface MutableAnnotationReference

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AnnotationReference, Element, MutableElement

    @Beta
public interface MutableAnnotationReference
extends AnnotationReference, MutableElement
    Represents an annotation.
    Author:
    Sven Efftinge
